title: 4-3-17  Cindy Grisdela, Kelly Bowser, Darlene Zimmerman, & Stephanie Kendron on Sloan's Talk show for American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
Cindy Grisdela is a talented designer and focuses on Improvisational work, she is also a member of my local quilt guild! She has a book called Artful Improv and I am happy to be able to learn some insider tips from her today.

https://cindygrisdela.com/
-----------------
Kelly Bowser of KelbySews shares all types of techniques and I love her tutorials with step outs that make is the projects fun and easy to do. She is active on Instagram so we are going to talk a bit about how to get involved there with group projects since sewing with others online is fun! And she has some tips for working with zippers, can’t wait!

http://www.kelbysews.com/
-------------
It’s always fun to catchup with Darlene Zimmerman of Feedsack Lady. She is a prolific designer of quilts, fabric and tools. Plus she has a quilt in both the spring Quilts & More issue and the June issue of American Patchwork & Quilting. I hope to get a few tips on her Hummingbird Nine-Patch quilt!

http://feedsacklady.com/
--------------------
Stephanie Kendron is the voice of the Modernsewciety Podcast and website. She interviews quilters and garment makers about the work they do. She has a fun style and I’m looking forward to getting to know more about her.

http://www.modernsewciety.com/
---------------
visit American Patchwork & Quilting at http://allpeoplequilt.com
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/apqmagazine
Visit host Pat Sloan at http://www.patsloan.com
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
